channel.title: Compiling .class files into a .jar file
channel.description: I figured I might PM Moparisthebest this but I think he may be to busy. I finally completed the ZezumaScape official client and its all compiled and ready for distrubution. The only problem is I want just one .jar file instead of 50+ .java files. Anyone know how to do this?

item.title: Compiling .class files into a .jar file
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

go to www.download.com
search for jar maker
download jar maker
install it
make a jar file

more i can’t say, sorry…

Read full topic
